Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 49th overall pick, by Oakland in 1970...
Injured on 4/29/1970 with a Pulled Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/2/1972 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 9-10 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1976, off Masanori Murakami (CLE)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/7/1976, off Tom Bradley (CAL)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1976, hitting .253 with 2 HR, 47 RBI...
Injured on 6/25/1977 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Baltimore on 8/13/1977...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 1978...
